title: Come Together
lyrics:
[intro] (Dm, Dm, Dm, Dm) (Dm) x4
(Dm) Here come old flat top, he come
(Dm) Grooving up slowly, he got
(Dm) Joo Joo eyeball, he one
(Dm) Holy roller, he got
(A7) Hair… down… to his knee
(G7)Got to be a joker, he just do what he please
 
[interlude] (Dm, Dm, Dm, Dm) (Dm) x4
 
(Dm) He wear no shoe shine, he got
(Dm) Toe jam football, he got
(Dm) Monkey finger, he shoot
(Dm) Coca cola, he say
(A7) "I know you… you know me."
(G7)One thing I can tell you is you got to be free
Come to-(Bm)gether, right (G-G-G-G)now (A)
Over me (Dm, Dm, Dm, Dm) (Dm) x4
 
(Dm) He bag production, he got
(Dm) Walrus gumboot, he got
(Dm) Ono sideboard, he one
(Dm) Spinal cracker, he got
(A7) Feet… down below his knee
(G7)Hold you in his armchair, you can feel his disease
Come to-(Bm)gether, right (G-G-G-G)now (A)
Over me (Dm, Dm, Dm, Dm) (Dm) x4
 
(Dm) He roller coaster, he got
(Dm) Early warning, he got
(Dm) Muddy water, he one
(Dm) Mo-jo filter, he say
(A7) "One and one and one is three."
(G7)Got to be good looking 'cause he so hard to see
Come to-(Bm)gether, right (G-G-G-G)now (A)
Over me (Dm, Dm, Dm, Dm) (Dm) x4 
(Dm) [end]
